title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document the project's functional and non-functional requirements.

title: Design Architecture
description: Create the high-level and detailed design for the LinguaLinx system.

title: Develop Frontend Interface
description: Build the user interface for user interaction with the LinguaLinx system.

title: Implement Backend Logic
description: Create the logic for processing translation requests and managing data.

title: Configure Database Schemas
description: Set up database schemas for storing translation data and metadata.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the system is secure and protects sensitive user data.

title: Deploy Development Environment
description: Set up the development environment for collaborative work.

title: Integrate Third-Party APIs
description: Connect the LinguaLinx system to third-party translation APIs and services.

title: Test Translation Functionality
description: Perform unit tests, integration tests, and functional tests to ensure accurate translations.

title: Document the System
description: Write technical documentation for the LinguaLinx system.
